highlights: Worked on the design of their brand new website for retirement financial planning services.
Incorporated and optimized the website with best SEO practices.

work.summary: LanternCRM is a startup based in Austin, TX, and is part of Capital Factory's incubator program. LanternCRM crafts business software that strengthens customer relationships and simplifies communication between coworkers.
highlights: Built a RESTful API from scratch using PHP and Laravel.
Used AngularJS and Bootstrap on LanternCRM's mobile-friendly version.
Worked with many services and APIs that integrated with Lantern: AWS SQS, AWS SNS, Google Apps, Context.IO, SendGrid, Twilio
Redesigned pages during a user's checkout process for homedepot.com which receives ~882 MM visitors annually.
Created an internal application used by managers to manage employees and teams in Node.js.

Developed an automated testing application for HomeDepot.com using the webdriver, Watij (Web Application Testing in Java). Users could select certain test cases and specify which environments from a frontend UI, which would kick-off the tests.
Created a ajax-powered dashboard using PHP and Javascript to monitor the status of servers.
